tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been on the hunt for a good dentist for the past two years, but to no avail. I was specifically looking for someone who was highly skilled and could minimize post-treatment pain. That's when I came across Dr. Manish Sharma, who, in my opinion, is a highly qualified and experienced professional.

Prior to Dr. Sharma, I had consulted with several dentists who recommended tooth extraction and sinus lift treatment. Others suggested full mouth rehabilitation. With all these conflicting recommendations, I was left confused and overwhelmed.

Fortunately, after two years of searching, I found Dr. Manish Sharma. He not only treated my severely decayed tooth without extraction but also suggested an alternative treatment plan that avoided sinus uplift surgery. This approach greatly appealed to me.

Throughout the treatment process, both during and after the procedures, I experienced no pain and swelling. I was incredibly pleased with the outcome and am grateful to have found Dr. Sharma.

In addition to his expertise, Dr. Sharma is also incredibly patient-centric. He took the time to explain the treatment plan thoroughly and address all my concerns. He also provided me with valuable advice on maintaining good oral hygiene.

My experience with Dr. Sharma was nothing short of divine. His expertise, patient-centric approach, and meticulous care made my dental treatment a seamless and comfortable experience. I am truly grateful for his guidance and the exceptional dental careÂ heÂ provided.

Thank God!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My front tooth was fractured in my school time. I have visited so many dentist for the treatment of my teeth but they didn't satisfy me about my treatment. Doctor Sharma was recommended by someone i know i met doctor. He examined my teeth and explain each and every point of treatments Like type of crown, what are the material available in market (zirconia), its effect after this there was no enigma left. Monetary was crystal clear with me where is my even single penny is going to be spent. He treated me with caress and due diligence. Where i am going to feel pain and what is the crucial part of treatment.Overall its was good and satisfactory treatment given by Doctor Sharma.
Thankyou Doctor
reply_text: Thank you for the encouraging words Sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had lost 3 front lower teeth after falling from the horse. Few visits to various dentist I was discouraged for implants rather advised to take dentures or live with it.I lived with it for over 8 years. I then meet Dr. Manish in a wedding. We have also been treated by his father for which we feel lucky Dr. JK Sharma has been a phenomenon in his oun unique way . Dr Manish said that I should not have to leave with such gaps right in the front.  He gave me three implants in the first go , this changed  my health, look and boosted my strength . Over a period of time I have got 6 implants and two crowns I can eat anything now with confidence. The eating uncertainties  have gone away . Dr Manish 's dental tips or invaluable.  He has a very sophisticated way of dealing with patients esp  the  senior citizens who tend to have total confidence in him . I cannot think of my dental problems without Dr Manish . His evaluate is a unique and one of its kind concept  which carries a  unheard of benefit for complicated cases . 
God bless you doctor Manish for contributing so many smiles around.
reply_text: Thank you for your inputs Sir, We are truly grateful for your kind words of encouragement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Implant Rehabilitation,Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery & Implantology,Removal tumors from the Jaw,
review:
18 month ago my sister had some serious health issue. Her lower jaw teeth was swimming in the air. So we fixed the meeting with the Dr Manish father. Because Dr Manish father(Dr J K Sharma) and my family leaving in same town(Gorakhpur). So Dr J K Sharma said we need a one OPG. So we did the OPG in near by x-ray lab. After diagnosis Dr J K Sharma found some issue in my sister lower jaw. He said lower jaw bone is melted now. So he said we need to find the root cause of this problem. He wriiten one more test which is called biopsy. Dr JK sharma cut a small tissue of lower jaw for biopsy. After one week we get the result of Biopsy test.
In Biopsy test impression was "Giant Cell reparative granuloma". So i decided to meet with Dr Manish Sharma. We meet two to three times for the Prcedure & Planning. After the meeting Dr Manish decided the date for Bone Graft Surgery. So he started the meeting with different doctors to prepare the team. Dr Manish had meeting with the Physician, Anesthesia, Maxillofacial Surgeon, Ortho Surgeon. Dr Manish build a great team to perform the procedure. After the building the team Dr Manish and team did the procedure. 
Every procedure was perform under guidance and planning of Dr Manish Sharma.  
And I'm very thankful to we have a great Maxillofacial Surgeon like Dr Shoyeb.
Dr Shoyeb play an important role in the prodcedure and Dental Implants.

In my experience both doctors(Dr Manish Sharma, Dr JK Sharma and Dr Shoyeb)is the most wonderful Doctor I have ever met. He is very friendly down to earth person explains you the problem well and takes care of each patient with attention.
In my opinion, a patient should feel safe and comfortable with the doctors(Dr Manish Sharma, Dr JK Sharma and Dr Shoyeb). My sister feel very comfortable safe with Dr Manish and I trust him. Even my parents share the same experience with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited for maintenance of dental implants and regulatory checkup. Mr. Doctor was not only thorough about the know hows about the problems related to implants but also enriched myself through pertinent check points to be kept in mind to elongate the life of the implants. Thank you very much for that, Mr. Doctor.

Moreover, in between the treatment, Mr. Doctor and myself had some nice discussion related to different topics like education, medical sciences, general politics, engineering, etc etc. 

All in all, it was a nice visit.
reply_text: Thank You Koustav Dey Sir. Your feedback is deeply cherished and acknowledged.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ****** ** ***** **** *** **** ******** good enough in dealing with patient's issues and concerns. He is one of the most humblest people I've ever met, very soft spoken, takes care of patient's physical and mental comfort. I had a wonderful experience with him since I was feeling discomfort because of my previous crowns and had aesthetic issues as well so I visited to Dr. Manish. His guidance helped me a lot to understand the procedure, dental crown and material. 
Appointments were on time.I had some timing issues but he managed my Appointments even on Sundays for that I'm very thankful to him. 
The cost of treatment is slightly higher side but it is worth the expertise and service he provides. 
Now extremely happy with the results.  Would like to thank Dr. Manish For giving me perfect yet natural smile. I haven't been as satisfied and happy with any other dentist.
Would completely recommend Dr. Manish sharma if you are looking for any kind of dental problem. ðŸ˜€
reply_text:
We thank you for your feedback Ms. Monica. 
It is always nice to learn that we have touched someone's life closely.
With tha ardvent of the technology in the dental Industry the laboratory costs have gone 3 times higher in the last decade. However these treatments come with a very high warranty and a stupendous quality.  The process is faster , more precise and very predictable. 
Thank you once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very punctual,for the morning appointment he was there before we reached the clinic.No issues in the appointment. The details of the  appointment were shared well in advance.Good and courteous behaviour. The doctor was very polite.The work atmosphere was very clean, hygienic and calm. My treatment was done with an extremely positive attitude. The doctor is definitely very skilled and my dental procedure was done safely. The tooth caps of my upper jaw were set cleanly and beautifully. The doctor motivated me to maintain my oral hygiene by stressing on its importance on every appointment.

review: The doctor was really friendly and I never had to wait. The wait time was really less. I had inflamed and bleeding gums and the doctor performed gum reduction to increase the visibility of teeth and reduce the bleeding in the gums. I was really satisfied with the treatment. The whole procedure was cost effective too. Overall my experience with the doctor was great and I would highly recommend him
